required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of the Preventable Passage of Patients Over 75 Years of Age to the Emergency Room of the CHRU of Nancy
clinical_study.official_title: Study of the Preventable Passage of Patients Over 75 Years of Age to the Emergency Room of the CHRU of Nancy

brief_summary.textblock:
The adult emergency service of the Nancy CHRU welcomes an average of 135 visits per day. Approximately 18% are patients over 75 years old, among them 45% go home at the end of their care. The mobile geriatric liaison team intervenes with these patients at the request of the emergency doctors before they return home in order to identify their fragility and implement appropriate measures.
We wish to know the characteristics of these avoidable passages in order to propose preventive measures upstream of these passages. To do this, we need to know the characteristics of those patients with an avoidable passage.

primary_outcome.measure: characteristics of preventable passages to the emergency room of the Nancy CHRU in the population over 75 years old
primary_outcome.time_frame: the day of the admission at emergency room

arm_group.arm_group_label: patient over 75 years of age with an emergency room visit
arm_group.description: Patients over 75 years of age, with a visit to the emergency department between April 1, 2019 and September 30, 2019, with a non-hospitalization at the end of their visit to the emergency department.

intervention.arm_group_label: patient over 75 years of age with an emergency room visit

study_pop.textblock: - Patients over 75 years of age, with a visit to the emergency department between April 1, 2019 and September 30, 2019, with a non-hospitalization at the end of their visit to the emergency department.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age>=75 years old
- admitted at emergency room between first april 2019 and 30 september 2019
- outpatients
Exclusion Criteria:
- inpatients
- discharged patients
- patients discharged against medical advice
- patients brought by police
